Text: The Third Fitzwilliam Meetinghouse is a historic meeting house on the village green in Fitzwilliam, New Hampshire.

Text: Third Fitzwilliam Meetinghouse:  It presently serves as Fitzwilliam Town Hall.

4:

Text: Third Fitzwilliam Meetinghouse:  A four-stage tower rises above the front facade, with a clock (given in 1861) in the first stage, and a Paul Revere bell hangs in the second stage belfry, an open section with round arches on all four sides.
